description: You have started to become rather proficient in handling heavy weaponry. Sledge-Fu allows you to bully an opponent using your strength until the right moment presents itself to swing your weapon properly for a killing blow.
initiate: You roll your neck and get ready to shatter your enemies.

static_buffs.name: Intimidating Figure
static_buffs.description:
No man, machine or monstrosity can get through you and your strength. 

+2 Block attempts, -3.0 Dodge skill, blocked damage reduced by 70%% of Strength.

onmove_buffs.name: Moving Bulk
onmove_buffs.description:
Moving your weight around makes it hard to take hits strategically, but it does prove useful for extra swing speed. 

-2 Block attempts, blocked damage increased by 70%% of Strength.
+10%% bonus to bashing damage.
Lasts 1 turn.

onmiss_buffs.name: Swinging Big
onmiss_buffs.description:
That's it! Now direct it towards them! 

+20%% bonus to bashing damage.
Enables "Flying Blow" technique.
Enables "Violent Shove" technique.
Lasts 2 turns. Stacks 3 times.

onattack_buffs.name: Tiring Control
onattack_buffs.description:
Directing your enemy with your strikes proves useful to make them predictable, but you grow inefficient with every new move. Take a break. 

+1 Block attempt.
+15%% movecost.
Lasts 2 turns. Stacks 3 times.

onblock_buffs.name: Riled Up
onblock_buffs.description:
Like a little fly, buzzing around harmlessly... 

+10%% bonus to bashing damage.
-10%% movecost.
Enables "Violent Shove" technique.
Lasts 1 turn.  Stacks 3 times.

ondodge_buffs.name: Eager For Contact
ondodge_buffs.description:
You dodged. Next time, you'll take the hit and make them pay properly. 

-3.0 Dodge skill
Lasts 3 turns.  Stacks 3 times.

description: You have started to become very proficient in handling heavy weaponry. Flail-Fu lets you redirect opponents as the chain wishes, or whirl the head for a heavy blow.
initiate: You grip your flail confidently and start swaying the chain.
%s grips their flail and sways the chain idly.

static_buffs.name: Metal Must Flow
static_buffs.description:
Your flail must keep spinning at all costs. 

+1.0 Dodge skill

onpause_buffs.name: Whirling Mass
onpause_buffs.description:
The faster it moves, the harder it hits.

+10% bonus to bashing damage.
Lasts 3 turns.  Stacks 5 times.

onmiss_buffs.name: Missed
onmiss_buffs.description:
Getting the flail back into proper control is quite the ordeal. 

-10%% bashing damage.
Lasts 1 turn. Stacks 2 times.

onattack_buffs.name: Slowing Mass
onattack_buffs.description:
Every strike takes from the speed you've built, but perhaps you have enough to keep going still.
-20%% bashing damage.
Lasts 2 turns. Stacks 5 times.

ondodge_buffs.name: Swift Mass
ondodge_buffs.description:
Dodging an attack only quickens your weapon!

+10%% bashing damage.
Enables "Stunning Blow" technique.
Lasts 1 turns.  Stacks 3 times.

description: You're not unused to the concept of killing things with your own hands. Glove-Fu lets you show the Zs the real definition of a smackdown with unrelenting, heavy hitting powercombos.
initiate: You assume a sturdy stance and keep one arm cocked and loaded.
%s assumes a sturdy stance and keeps an arm ready.

static_buffs.name: Ready
static_buffs.description:
You're ready. Your fighting implements are ready. They always will be. 

+2 Block attempts, -1.0 Dodge skill, blocked damage reduced by 50%% of Strength.

onpause_buffs.name: Waiting
onpause_buffs.description:
You're watching. You're waiting. Your fist aches for action.

+10% bonus to bashing damage./n+1 Block attempts.
Lasts 1 turn.  Stacks 2 times.

onattack_buffs.name: Smackdown
onattack_buffs.description:
There's nothing that can stop a smackdown once it starts!
+10%% bashing damage./n+1 Block attempts.
Lasts 2 turns. Stacks 2 times.

onblock_buffs.name: Stopped And Smacked
onblock_buffs.description: One punch is just your entry. Now you can start the real deal.

ondodge_buffs.name: Eager For Smackdown
ondodge_buffs.description:
You dodged. Next time, you'll take the hit so you can begin the smackdown. 

-3.0 Dodge skill
Lasts 3 turns.  Stacks 3 times.
